variable.name: cgb1a
variable.description: Wrist - abductor pollicis brevis muscle: distance (mm)

variable.name: cgb1b
variable.description: Wrist - abductor pollicis brevis muscle: latency (msec)

variable.name: cgb1c
variable.description: Wrist - abductor pollicis brevis muscle: amplitude (mv)

variable.name: cgb1e
variable.description: Elbow - wrist: temperature before nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb1j
variable.description: Elbow - wrist: temperature after nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb2a
variable.description: Digit II - wrist: temperature before nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb2f
variable.description: Digit II - wrist: temperature after nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb3d
variable.description: Below capitulum fibulae - ankle: temperature before nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.description: Below capitulum fibulae - ankle: temperature after nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb4a
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): temperature before nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgb4b
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): distance (mm)

variable.name: cgb4c
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): latency (msec)

variable.name: cgb4d
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): velocity (m/sec)

variable.name: cgb4e
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): amplitude (microv)

variable.name: cgb4f
variable.description: Calf - lateral malleolus (14 cm proximal to active electrode): temperature after nerve conduction measurement - Note: There are several instances of obvious errors in recording some body temperatures, e.g., 2 (variable=cgb3d) and 10.1 (variable=cjb1j) degrees centigrade. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: cgwindow
variable.description: Visit held falls within time window

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value
